blog.name: protect-tyrus
blog.title: Cyrus Goodman
blog.description: All of my thoughts on the purest most wholesome show on television.

summary: I’d just like to send my thoughts and prayers to the entire cast and crew of Andi Mack. Their world literally changed in a...
body: I’d just like to send my thoughts and prayers to the entire cast and crew of Andi Mack. Their world literally changed in a matter of hours as someone that they trusted and cared about has been exposed as one of the worst kind of criminals. I can’t even fathom how hurt and/or traumatized they might especially the teens on the show as they have to deal with a thousand what if’s and how could I not have noticed. This is a man they worked with for years starting at the ages of 11-14. I know many have said this already but please do not harass the cast and crew about the situation especially since they most likely found out today as well. Hopefully they will make it through as well as the show.

blog.name: disneymack
blog.title: andi mack trash
blog.description:
sadie. 23. she/they. lesbian. here to talk about tv & give advice. hoodie enthusiast. fandom mother.

main blog & twitter: sadieannerue instagram: dailymackcast, andimackpapercraneproject

summary:
please be respectful of yourself and others
if you are a minor and the discussion surrounding stoney westmoreland is making you...
body:
please be respectful of yourself and others

if you are a minor and the discussion surrounding stoney westmoreland is making you uncomfortable, please blacklist his name or maybe avoid the tags altogether for a few days.

if you are someone (adult or child) who has post traumatic stress or experience with sexual assault or pedophilia, please do the same.

if you are someone who is able to talk about sexual assault, pedophilia, etc. without compromising your own safety and wellbeing, please keep talking about this subject! it is so important to keep talking about this and not let it just be swept under the rug.

if you do want to talk about this, please be respectful of people who don’t want to hear about it. keep the proper tags and help teach people how to block tags if they need it. don’t spam the andi mack tag with unnecessary negativity. some posts are fine, but don’t tag them just to spite or upset people.

if someone’s posts in the tags or on your dashboard (including my own) are making you upset or triggered, whether it is related to stoney or not, remind yourself that you are allowed to unfollow/block anyone you want to. you are not obligated to put up with someone just because you like the same show. your social media should be a safe place for you.

keep letting the cast finish their last days on set in peace. i know most people are being respectful towards them but keep it up. if they want to carry on like nothing happened, for now, let them. these are kids who have unknowingly been working with a child predator for the last two years. if we feel betrayed, traumatized, and disgusted, imagine how they must be feeling. and even if they somehow aren’t traumatized, remember that their jobs and livelihood likely depend partially on how they handle this. it’s a lot of pressure for a group of teenagers.

remember that everyone has the right to their own feelings and reactions to this. cast, crew, fans, parents. you don’t know how this affects anyone but yourself. you don’t have to pick a fight over something already so heavy.

avoid discussions about this on outside websites. gossip blogs and news websites and facebook comments are starting to fill with religious hate groups and trolls trying to turn this into an anti-gay thing. i don’t know if they’re aware that stoney is openly gay, or if they are directing it all towards the show itself because of cyrus. but still, don’t put yourself through the misery of reading it and feeding the trolls.

take a break when things are overwhelming. or talk to someone you trust. my ask is still open if anyone needs to talk, or you can find me on twitter (@sadieannerue). take care of each other and take care of yourself. the world is dark enough without any of us adding to that right now.

summary: Disney Channel Actor Arrested and Fired for Plotting Sex With 13 Year-Old
title: Disney Channel Actor Arrested and Fired for Plotting Sex With 13 Year-Old
excerpt: Stoney Westmoreland had a prominent role on Andi Mack.
description:
Stoney Westmoreland, a Disney Channel actor who’s currently playing a key supporting role on Andi Mack as Andi’s grandfather, has been arrested for allegedly trying to have sex with a teen. Per Deadline, Salt Lake City court documents state Westmoreland’s arrest stemmed from “investigation of enticing a minor by Internet or text,” when he asked a 13 year-old “to engage in acts with him and to send nude photos.” He, also, sent “pornographic” photos of himself, and he was arrested by the city’s police while en route to pick up the person he believed to be the teen. As a result of his arrest, the Disney Channel released a statement to confirm he has since been fired from Andi Mack.

“Given the nature of the charges and our responsibility for the welfare of employed minors,” a rep for the network said, “we have released him from his recurring role and he will not be returning to work on the series which wraps production on its third season next week.” Outside of this Generation Z-skewing series, Westmoreland also appeared on many mainstream television shows, such as Scandal, Breaking Bad, and Better Call Saul.

summary: ok i’m making a video about the stoney situation for my English class because i decided it contributes to my tyrus article (at...
body: ok i’m making a video about the stoney situation for my English class because i decided it contributes to my tyrus article (at least for the “why disney shouldn’t canon tyrus part [our teacher told us to write the opposite opinion of ours]). should i post it on Tumblr or people will get mad?

summary: Life Needs A Little Mystery
title: Life Needs A Little Mystery
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2A23dYV

by BulletofBullets

Andi slides toward me until her legs bump against my thigh. She grabs my right hand, tracing the lines as if she’s a palm reader. “You’re hella mysterious, Amber.”

My breath comes out a little shaky, caught off guard by how close she is. My eyes scan her face, hesitating on her lips. This isn’t the first time I’ve thought about kissing her, though it is the closest I’ve ever been. I could easily lean in, close the little distance between us. I exert myself to look back into her eyes though, then remember I need to respond. “Hella? Who says that?”

[Andi Mack AU based on Before The Storm.]

Words: 2064, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Andi Mack (TV), Life Is Strange: Before The Storm (Video Game)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F
  • Characters: Andi Mack, Amber (Andi Mack), T. J. Kippen, Cyrus Goodman, Other Character Tags to Be Added
  • Relationships: Amber/Andi Mack, Cyrus Goodman/T.J. Kippen (minor)
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, Fluff and Angst, Angst, Heavy Angst, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, Hurt/Comfort, Implied/Referenced Homophobia, Homophobia, Family Secrets, Family Issues, Daddy Issues, Abusive Parents, Protective Siblings, Kippen Siblings, Kippen Twins, Other Additional Tags to Be Added
